mxCell.value:
Auction Service
owner: Yifei Xu
usage: create an auction item, 
search items by keyword/category, update/delete existing auction items.
operation: use 'python3 auction_service.py' to start the service.
host: localhost:6664
api: get_all_auction_items, get_all_auction_items_by_key, 
get_all_auction_items_by_category, create_auction_item, 
update_auction_item, remove_auction_item, etc
synchronicity: auction service uses synchronous communication through REST api and flask framework, to provide/create/modify/delete auction items info to frontend user/admin.

User Service
owner: Tian Ma
usage: create a new user, log in existing users, list / update / delete / bid / flag / categorize items, see all bids, add an item to cart, and checkout carts. 
operation: use 'python3 user_service.py' to start the service.
host: localhost:6662
api:create_user, login, list_item, update_item, delete_item, bid_item, flag_item, cagegotize_item, see_all_bids, add_to_cart, checkout_cart
synchronicity: user service uses synchronous communication through REST api and flask framework.

Front End
owner: Kun Qian
usage: create an auction item, 
search items by keyword/category, update/delete existing auction items.create a new user, log in existing users, list / update / delete / bid / flag / categorize items, see all bids, add an item to cart, and checkout carts. Manage users, items and auctions.
operation: use 'flask run --host=127.0.0.1 --port=6663' to start the service. Need to run other services first for full functionality of front end.
host: localhost: 6663
api: create_user, login, list_item, update_item, delete_item, bid_item, flag_item, cagegotize_item, see_all_bids,add_to_cart,checkout_cart, create_auction_item, get_all_auction_items,get_auction_items_by_keyword, update_auction_item, manage_users, manage_items , manage auctions
synchronicity: front end uses synchronous communication through REST api and flask framework.

Admin Service
Owner: Anirudh Sriram
Usage: Stop auction early, Add/Modify/Remove Categories, View all/current auctions, Sort auctions, View Metrics, View Flagged Items, Remove/Block users, View/respond to user emails, Monitor buyer/seller disputes, Process refund requests.
Operation: use 'python3 admin_service.py' to start the service.
API: list_auctions, stop_auction, add_category, remove_category, modify_category, sort_auctions, list_metrics, list_flagged_items, remove_user, block_user, view_emails, respond_to_email, list_disputes, process_refund
Synchronicity: Admin service uses synchronous communication through REST api and the Flask framework.

Auction Service

create_item
update_item
remove_item
start_item_auction

User Stories :

get_all_auction_items: provide all the current items with details that during auction window to the calling service.

get_all_auction_items_by_key: provide the item details that matches the key (no matter the item start auction or not or already end) to the calling service.

get_all_auction_items_by_category: provide all the item details that matches the category and during its auction window to the calling service.

get_all_auction_items_by_keyword: provide all the item details that matches the keyword in its name and during its auction window to the calling service.

create_auction_item: auction service will create an auction item, usually called by user service, with item details provided from frontend.

update_auction_item: auction service will update an auction item details, usually called by user/Admin service, with item details provided from frontend.

remove_auction_item: auction service will erase an auction item record from database, usually called by Admin service, with item key provided from frontend

bid_item: place a bid to an item if it is in auction state.

update_auction_items_state: an external process will periodically calling this api to update each item's state, which could be 'created', 'started' or 'closed'

User Stories :

create_user: allow a new user to create an account

find_user: allow an existing user to find their own account and perform actions later

delete_user: allow an existing user to delete their account

login / logout: allow users to log in and log out

update_user_info: allow an user to update their own account information

suspend_user: allow an user to suspend their account for some certain time

list_item_for_auction: allow the user to list their items for auction with details provided by front end

update_item_properties: allow the user to update item properties such as price, quantity, color, etc with details provided by front end

flag_inappropriate: allow the user to flag an listing as inappropriate for further admin review

categorize_item: allow the user to modify or give a correct category for a listing

delete_item: allow the user to delete an item

bid_item: allow the user to place a bid on an item

see_all_bids: provide the user with all the bid they have placed before

buy_now: allow the user to make a purchase at a pre-set price without bidding

checkout_cart: allow the user to pay for everything in their cart

User Stories :

show_login_page: shows the login page to user, allow user to login

show_all_auction_items: display all items of an auction, including all item information and the remaining time

show_create_user_page: shows the create account page to user, allow user to create accounts 

show_user_info_page: allow users to see and modify their own account information

refresh_all_auction_items: get the latest auction items information and show on page

refresh_user_info: allow the user to get their latest information

verify_user: allow the user to check whether their accounts information are correct

create _user: allow the user to register their account

get_all_auction_items: allow the user to get all auction items from the mediator

get_user_info: allow the user to get their basic information

add_item : allow the user to add an item in au auction

User Service

remove_user

block_user

unblock_user

Auction Service

get_all_auction_items


get_all_auction_items_by_key


get_all_auction_items_by_category

User Stories :

add_category: Enables an admin to add a category to the auctions 

modify_category: Enables an admin to change a category name

delete_category: Enables an admin to delete a category from the auctions

view_metrics: Enables an admin to view metrics on platform sales

view_flagged_items: Enables an admin to view all auction items flagged by users

remove_user: Enables an admin to remove a user from the platform

block_user: Enables an admin to block a user from the platform temporarily

unblock_user: Enables an admin to unblock a blocked user 

view_emails: Enables an admin to view all user emails

respond_email: Enables an admin to respond to a user_email

view_disputes:  Allows an admin to view all current buyer-seller disputes

process_refund_request: Allows an admin to process user refund request and delete a dispute

login / logout: Allow admin to log in and log out of the system

Email Service

 view_emails

respond_email

Email Service
owner: Yifei Xu
usage: send email to specific email addr, subject, and body
operation: use 'python3 email_service.py' to start the service. (rabbitmq-server and postgresSQL server needs to be installed first)
host: localhost:6667
api: send_email
synchronicity: email service uses asynchronous communication through rabbitmq. provide email services to all requested services.

Decoupled between each two services direct connection.
Improved development efficiency and application maintainability.
